Indicator: Proportion of all patients presenting with any acute respiratory tract infection (RTI) given an oral antibiotic, including amoxicillin.
Symptoms: Acute cough OR Sore throat OR Sneezing / nasal congestion / runny or stuffy nose OR Ear discharge OR Ear pain
Symptom codes: NASAL_CONGEST_NOSE OR ACUTE_COUGH OR THROAT_SORE OR EAR_PAIN OR EAR_DISCHARGE
ABX-INFECTION-1: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis AND Pharyngitis
ABX-INFECTION-3: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis

Indicator: Proportion of all patients presenting with any acute respiratory tract infection (RTI) given oral antibiotics by AWaRe category (Access or Watch)
Symptoms: Acute cough OR Sore throat OR Sneezing / nasal congestion / runny or stuffy nose OR Ear discharge OR Ear pain
Symptom codes: NASAL_CONGEST_NOSE OR ACUTE_COUGH OR THROAT_SORE OR EAR_PAIN OR EAR_DISCHARGE
ABX-INFECTION-1: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis AND Pharyngitis
ABX-INFECTION-3: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis

Indicator: Proportion of patients with acute RTIs prescribed the total daily dose of oral antibiotics recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book.
Symptoms: Acute cough OR Sore throat OR Sneezing / nasal congestion / runny or stuffy nose OR Ear discharge OR Ear pain
Symptom codes: NASAL_CONGEST_NOSE OR ACUTE_COUGH OR THROAT_SORE OR EAR_PAIN OR EAR_DISCHARGE
ABX-INFECTION-1: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis AND Pharyngitis
ABX-INFECTION-3: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis

Indicator: Proportion of patients with acute RTIs given the duration in days of oral antibiotics recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book
Symptoms: Acute cough OR Sore throat OR Sneezing / nasal congestion / runny or stuffy nose OR Ear discharge OR Ear pain
Symptom codes: NASAL_CONGEST_NOSE OR ACUTE_COUGH OR THROAT_SORE OR EAR_PAIN OR EAR_DISCHARGE
ABX-INFECTION-1: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis AND Pharyngitis
ABX-INFECTION-3: Mild/moderate CAP AND Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis

Indicator: Proportion of patients with any ear/sinus/throat infection (not pneumonia) given an oral antibiotic.
Symptoms: Ear discharge OR Ear pain OR "Sore throat" OR "Sneezing / nasal congestion / runny or stuffy nose"
Symptom codes: EAR_PAIN OR EAR_DISCHARGE OR NASAL_CONGEST_NOSE OR THROAT_SORE
ABX-INFECTION-1: Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis AND Pharyngitis
ABX-INFECTION-2: Acute otitis media AND Acute sinusitis

Indicator: Proportion of all patients presenting with any dental infections given an oral antibiotic.
ABX-INFECTION-3: (Dentalsoft tissues(e.g. pericoronitis or necrotizing periodontal disease)

Indicator: Proportion of patients with dental infections given oral antibiotics by AWaRe category (Access or Watch)
ABX-INFECTION-3: (Dentalsoft tissues(e.g. pericoronitis or necrotizing periodontal disease)

Indicator: Proportion of patients with dental infections prescribed the total daily dose of oral antibiotic recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book.
ABX-INFECTION-3: (Dentalsoft tissues(e.g. pericoronitis or necrotizing periodontal disease)

Indicator: Proportion of patients presenting with dental infections given the duration in days of oral antibiotics recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book.
ABX-INFECTION-3: (Dentalsoft tissues(e.g. pericoronitis or necrotizing periodontal disease)

Indicator: Proportion of all patients presenting with acute infectious non-bloody diarrhoea given oral antibiotics.
Proportion of all patients presenting with acute infectious bloody diarrhoea given oral an oral antibiotic.
Proportion of patients with acute bloody infectious diarrhoea given oral antibiotics by AWaRe category (Access or Watch)
Proportion of patients presenting with acute lymphadenitis given an oral antibiotic.
Proportion of patients with acute lymph nodes infections given oral antibiotics by AWaRe category (Access or Watch)

Proportion of patients presenting with acute lymphadenitis given the duration in days of oral antibiotics recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book.

Proportion of patients presenting with mild* skin/soft tissue infections (SSTIs) given oral antibiotics by AWaRe category (Access or Watch). (*severity criteria as per AWaRe guidance)

Proportion of patients presenting with mild* skin/soft tissue infections (SSTIs) prescribed the total daily dose of oral antibiotics recommended in the WHO AWaRe Antibiotic Book. (*severity criteria as per AWaRe guidance)
